summary: Adds a dialogue option to all interact-able NPCs, telling you their disposition.
descriptionHtml:
[Spent four hours on this little bugger. The CK is pisher than pish.]

Made for a fellow who wanted a way to check, in-game without the use of the console, a way to find out what an NPC thinks of you.

Adds a dialogue option to all interact-able NPCs, with a disposition between -2 and 4, telling you their disposition.
Utilizes Message Boxes rather than Dialogue due to CK woes involving silent dialogue.

I refuse to waste any more time on this mod. You want to work on it? Be my guest, you poor sadist.
author: FiftyTifty
